title: The most extravagant Christmas crackers: what’s in the set that costs £5,000?
text:
Alongside the turkey, pudding and sherry, the humble (or in this case not-so-humble) cracker can make or break your Christmas dinner. Whether you opt for a traditional set from Harrods or an ornate design from an independent retailer, you need crackers that will complement the work of your table designer and florist, and set the festive tone.

That said, the design is not the only important factor - it’s what’s on the inside that counts. While the inclusion of a paper hat and bad joke is almost guaranteed in any cracker, the trinkets within vary, depending on the retailer.

If you want to treat your family and guests to luxurious gifts, as opposed to the standard pair of nail clippers, it is definitely...
description: Alongside the turkey, pudding and sherry, the humble (or in this case not-so-humble) cracker can make or break your Christmas dinner.
